fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.zigbee.driver

Interface ZigbeeDeviceTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZigbeeBinaryLight, ZigbeeDeviceDiscoveryImpl, ZigbeeMotionSensor, ZigbeePhotometer, ZigbeePowerSwitch, ZigbeePresenceSensor, ZigbeePushButton, ZigbeeThermometer

    public interface ZigbeeDeviceTracker
extends EventListener
    Provides this service to be notified of zigbee device events. You can specify a filter to define what are the events you are interested in: example : zigbee.listener.filter="(module.address =1234)"
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FILTER_PROP_NAME

        Called when a device battery level has changed.
